[h1]--- Counter-Strike: Source ---[/h1]

[i]"A classic tactical shooter that brings fun and joy to online gaming."[/i]

The game may be old, but it still lives up to old school gaming that keeps it nostalgia. There are no additional add-ons, no game passes, just a pure game truly made from love and passion.
Personally, it does not feel super competitive as CSGO, which is a good thing because it differs between both games. There are more casual elements and as mention before, the game focuses on an enjoyable experience.

[b]Story/Plot[/b]
Storywise, there is nothing too complex in the lore. It just a simple plot of Counter-Terrorist VS Terrorist in bomb and hostage situations that takes place in the modern era. 
Each team has 4 countries to select from. One example is the Counter-Terrorist that allows you to pick characters from England, America, France and Germany. They all have their own little background about their unit that provides a good history lesson to learn from.

[b]Gameplay/Mechanics[/b]
Anyone who is familiar or played CSGO, the gunplay is similar but not as what would you really expect. Most of your shots would land where you aim your crosshair and it is not too heavy focus on recoil patterns. However, the game is still skilled based but follows the [i]Easy To Learn, Hard To Master[/i] system. 
Bomb mode is two objectives scattered apart from each other from the map, while Hostage mode behaves the same, but requires 4 hostages to follow you to your CT spawn, rather than carrying one of them.

[b]Presentation[/b]
For an old game, it may not have the 4K Triple-A visuals as modern gaming, but the game still looks good overall. People like to complain in these type of games with low polys and textures, but graphics in gaming is nothing about that. It is all about the art style that is presented that clearly shows a difference between their newer and previous titles of the Counter-Strike series.

[b]Summary[/b]
Overall, the game still has an active community with amazing mods to implement into your game, including new ones being posted every day. On the plus side, it has good performance for low-end PCs, especially how each update on CSGO requires more GPU and CPU to get a decent FPS. I ensure you that the game is worthy of your precious time.

O sucessor do super clássico Counter Strike (Expasão/Mod do Half Life 1), sendo atualizado p/ a nova engine gráfica da Valve (chamada Source) em Half Life 2. 
Em comparação ao CS:1.6, a diferença que percebi (além de gráfica) está no aumento de velocidade da movimentação dos jogadores (fazendo desse o CS mais dinâmico entre os 3 que há) e de algumas armas também, como a tal famosa 'rambo'. Nessa versão, os PRO's em dar kill através da tática 'Wallbanged' vão se lametar por não conseguir mais fazer isso, ainda há possibilidades de kill varando algum objeto, mas isso varia da largura desse objeto. Dar kill torrando também se tornou uma dificuldade, c/ exceção das 3 novas armas 'overpowers': ES C90 (P90); M249 (Rambo) e a D3/AU-1 e KRIEG 550 (conhecidas com 'Tek-tek' ou 'Nave Mãe').
Se você busca um CS c/ jogadores competitivos em partidas super rápidas/dinâmicas, esse é o melhor CS p/ você (suponho eu. Kkkk..).

[h1]"Оригинальная игра с графоном. Всё."[/h1]

В основном прошла мимо меня. Да, я играл в CSS одно время, всё так же с ботами. И так как это полный копипаст адинышесть, но на движке Source, то мне абсолютно нечего написать.
Могу немного сравнить ее с CSGO. Потому что да, они обе на движке Source. Почему нельзя было заняться CSS, зафигачить туда режимов, матчмейкинга, злоебучих коробок в конце-концов? Но это уже совсем другая история. [strike]Моя история болезни в психбольнице[/strike]
Но вот что действительно стоило бы добавить, так это нового контента. Новых элементов геймплея, механики, ну пушек новых хотя бы! Можно мне губу раскатать?
Начну раскатывать. Представьте - если бы, скажем, в Source добавили возможность бегать, и целиться не только из снайперок, возможность использовать сошки, гранатометы (Не верю, что их нельзя сбалансировать), разные броники, стимпаки... Да, разрабы вроде как пытаются добавить что-то из этого в CSGO, но дальше альфа-теста это до сих пор не зашло.
Стандарты, заложенные во времена мода для HL сделали серию CS легендарной. Это было круто тогда, но за пятнадцать с лишним лет должно было устареть и надоесть. Или нет?..
